name: Free Indeed
description: Naz was an alcoholic living in Trinidad. He had heard about Jesus as a kid but didnâ€™t have anyone to guide him. He felt the Holy Spirit convicting him of his alcoholism, and missionaries who came discipled and encouraged him. Today Naz is a pastor, loving husband and father of daughters Abby and Bethany. Storytellers Rachel Ingram and Miki Veness tell this story of victory.
author: Rachel Ingram & Miki Veness
